mn76:16.11: mahākappino → mahākappuno (bj, pts1), cullāsīti → cūḷāsīti (s1-3, km)
mn76:30.2: tattha tattha → tathā tathā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn76:30.3: aññathātipi → aññathāpi (bj, pts1), tathātipi → tathāpi (bj, pts1), evantipi → evampi (bj, pts1)
mn76:33.1: tāni → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3, pts1 potthakesu
mn76:35-42.4: Yasmiṃ kho → yasmiṃ kho pana (s1-3, km, mr)
